answers.answer: Hello,I dont think the hydrocele of itself will make BS rise.  However, pain, infection (if it were infected), and stress can make blood sugars rise.Hope this helps.

question: My husband is a type I diabetic and has recently developed a testicular hydrocele.  I want to know if the hydrocele can cause his sugars to go up.
title: sugar levels in diabetes and testicular hydrocele
